name: clearlift-api
description: Complete backend API template using Hono + Chanfana + D1 + Vitest.

scripts.dev:local: npm run db:migrate:local && wrangler dev --env local
scripts.predeploy: npx tsx scripts/capture-bookmark.ts && npm run db:migrate:remote
scripts.db:migrate:local: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --local && wrangler d1 migrations apply ANALYTICS_DB --local && wrangler d1 migrations apply AI_DB --local
scripts.db:migrate:remote: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --remote && wrangler d1 migrations apply ANALYTICS_DB --remote && wrangler d1 migrations apply AI_DB --remote
scripts.test: wrangler deploy --dry-run && npx vitest run --config tests/vitest.config.mts
scripts.test:all: npm run test:local && npm run test:prod
